item.description:
Bullies, bullies everywhere!

NEBBC On-Leash Pack Walk to take place Saturday, October 2nd at Blackstone River and Canal
Heritage State Park!

Come join the New England Bully Breed Club at 11:00a for a leashed pack walk in one of the areas most beautiful walking trails! Meet our two- and four-footed members, while enjoying a scenic local park.

Meet us at the address listed below between 11:00a and 11:15a and receive your free blue/gold bandana for your dog to sport! What a site: dozens of beautiful bullies and bully-lovers all walking together in matching NEBBC gear! What a nice way to generate some interest!

Also, submit your idea for any future event (with possible location included) to receive a goodie bag for your pooch! There will be a drawing at 11:30... If your idea is chosen, you'll receive a free NEBBC tote bag, as well!

Remember, non-bully dogs are always welcome! You need not have a bully breed, only a love of them :)

(Photographers wanted for this event! Anyone interested, contact Cassie at justcassie101@comcast.net!)
item.how_to_find_us: Blue and gold bandanas and NEBBC gear!
item.name: On-Leash NEBBC Pack Walk
